divs: Sighting DetailsI am a panamanian boy, I am 13 years old I know little bit of English. I saw 2 static stars high in the sky at a dark night. I saw it above the Panama Costway [the Costway doesn't have high edifications]. I saw it for 5 minutes but one of them disappeared and appeared many times. 1. I was in the park playing with 5 girls before I saw the UFOs. 2. I was walking toward my mother before I saw the UFOs. 3. I think it was a helicopter. 4. The stars was stactic in the sky but one of them apirse and disapiers many times. 5. I was strange because I dont know what were this things. I told my mother. 6. I went to my house and stay there
Summary: I saw 2 static stars high in the sky.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Panama
There were no other sightings in Panama on or around June 14th 2009
